sentences.en: At the same time the Company also focus on business diversification.
sentences.cn: 同时本公司也注重经营的多样化.

sentences.en: Bond funds are very popular because are convenient and provide diversification.
sentences.cn: 债券基金很受欢迎因为既方便又提供了投资多样性.

sentences.en: Business strategies, different success of the seller's diversification strategy also.
sentences.cn: 经营战略上, 不同成功卖家的策略也多样化.

sentences.en: Chui said in his inauguration speech Sunday , which stressed economic diversification.
sentences.cn: 努力共建族群和谐、社区共融.

sentences.en: Diversification of color and pictorial, in response to a different friend's preferences.
sentences.cn: 多样化的颜色及图案, 回应了不同朋友的喜好.

sentences.en: Diversification of investment in 2009 will occupy the highest position.
sentences.cn: 2009年投资多样化将占据至高无上的位置.

sentences.en: Even a little diversification can provide a substantial reduction in variability.
sentences.cn: 即时一丁点分散也能造成变异性的显著降低.

sentences.en: Experts say the future of space tourism will show a mass, project diversification, companies competition and improve the four major trends in safety regulations.
sentences.cn: 专家说，未来的空间旅游将显示一个大规模，项目多样化，企业竞争和提高安全法规的四大趋势。

sentences.en: Exploitation resulted diversification of habitat type which increasing some bird species . however , mangrove and mudflat reducing resulted disappear of some bird species.
sentences.cn: 生境类型的多样化增加了不少鸟类物种，同时开发与破坏也导致了一些鸟类物种的消失。

sentences.en: Firm diversification is increasingly achieved by the means of takeover and merger.
sentences.cn: 通过接管和兼并,厂商经营范围日益多样化.

sentences.en: In the meantime, user demand also is in gradually diversification.
sentences.cn: 同时, 用户需求也在逐渐多样化.

sentences.en: More generally, financial innovation was supposed to bring diversification and stability.
sentences.cn: 更概括地说, 金融创新曾被认为会带来多样化和稳定.

sentences.en: Our economy thrives on openness, diversification and fair competition.
sentences.cn: 我们的蓬勃经济发展有赖开放 、 多元化及公平竞争.

sentences.en: The conclusion of diversification strategy of this paper can conduct the business.
sentences.cn: 研究得出的关于多元化经营的结论,对企业具有一定的指导意义.

sentences.en: The field of literature has taken on a glory complexion during the socialism era. And it will lead to a diversification in the thinking mode of literature.
sentences.cn: 社会主义新时期的文艺园地，呈现出摇曳多姿、竞艳争辉的繁荣局面，这必然引起人们文学观念和思维方式的变化。

sentences.en: The idea behind diversification is to invest in a large number of assets so that a loss in any particular investment is minimized by gains in others.
sentences.cn: 多元化背后的想法是投资一个数额巨大的资产，这样任何特定投资的损失都被其他投资获得的收益最小化了。

sentences.en: The seminar was to discuss diversification of agriculture.
sentences.cn: 该研讨会讨论的是农业多种经营。

sentences.en: Theses diversification safety mechanisms comply with CENELEC EN 50129 for SIL 4 classification.
sentences.cn: 这些分散的安全机构符合关于SIL4级的CENELECEN50129标准.

sentences.en: Yet any attempt at significant diversification would seriously dent their value.
sentences.cn: 然而,任何显著实现外汇储备多元化的努力都会严重削弱其价值.

words.tran_cn: 不同的；多种多样的；变化多的
使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大

phrases.tran_cn: 多元化经营；经营多角化
